VersionInfo.Title: Markdown Monster 3.0.8 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
This release adds a number of enhancements:
* Runs on .NET 7.0 * New GitHub Dark and updated GitHub Preview Themes * Updated Light Mode Application Theme * Many UI updates and workflow optimizations * Many new Markup Operations * Improved Multiline Markup Support * Weblog New Posts Folder for Drafts * Improved Html and PDF Exports * Customizable External Programs Support * plus [much more...](https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/main/Changelog.md)
<small>**Note:** v3 is a [paid upgrade from v2](https://markdownmonster.west-wind.com/purchase#upgrades). </small>
